Kim Jong-un is a 37-year-old Korean political figure, best known as North Korean supreme leader.

Kim Jong-un

According to a top source, Kim Jong-un Link: https://en.mediamass.net/people/kim-jong-un is leading the race to become Time magazine's Person of the Year in 2020. But while the political figure's fans are thrilled with the news, many people hold a very different opinion.
